verses.verse: Then all <WH3605> Israel <WH3478> gathered themselves <WH6908> to <WH413> David <WH1732> unto Hebron, <WH2275> saying, <WH559> Behold, <WH2009> we <WH587> are thy bone <WH6106> and thy flesh. <WH1320>

And moreover <WH1571> in time past, <WH8543> <WH1571> <WH8032> even <WH1571> when Saul <WH7586> was <WH1961> king, <WH4428> thou <WH859> wast he that leddest out <WH3318> and broughtest in <WH935> <WH853> Israel: <WH3478> and the LORD <WH3068> thy God <WH430> said <WH559> unto thee, Thou <WH859> shalt feed <WH7462> <WH853> my people <WH5971> <WH853> Israel, <WH3478> and thou <WH859> shalt be <WH1961> ruler <WH5057> over <WH5921> my people <WH5971> Israel. <WH3478>

Therefore came <WH935> all <WH3605> the elders <WH2205> of Israel <WH3478> to <WH413> the king <WH4428> to Hebron; <WH2275> and David <WH1732> made <WH3772> a covenant <WH1285> with them in Hebron <WH2275> before <WH6440> the LORD; <WH3068> and they anointed <WH4886> <WH853> David <WH1732> king <WH4428> over <WH5921> Israel, <WH3478> according to the word <WH1697> of the LORD <WH3068> by <WH3027> Samuel. <WH8050>

And David <WH1732> and all <WH3605> Israel <WH3478> went <WH1980> to Jerusalem, <WH3389> which <WH1931> is Jebus; <WH2982> where <WH8033> the Jebusites <WH2983> were, the inhabitants <WH3427> of the land. <WH776>

And the inhabitants <WH3427> of Jebus <WH2982> said <WH559> to David, <WH1732> Thou shalt not <WH3808> come <WH935> hither. <WH2008> Nevertheless David <WH1732> took <WH3920> <WH853> the castle <WH4686> of Zion, <WH6726> which <WH1931> is the city <WH5892> of David. <WH1732>

And David <WH1732> said, <WH559> Whosoever <WH3605> smiteth <WH5221> the Jebusites <WH2983> first <WH7223> shall be <WH1961> chief <WH7218> and captain. <WH8269> So Joab <WH3097> the son <WH1121> of Zeruiah <WH6870> went first up, <WH5927> <WH7223> and was <WH1961> chief. <WH7218>
And David <WH1732> dwelt <WH3427> in the castle; <WH4679> therefore <WH5921> <WH3651> they called <WH7121> it the city <WH5892> of David. <WH1732>

And he built <WH1129> the city <WH5892> round about, <WH4480> <WH5439> even from <WH4480> Millo <WH4407> round about: <WH5439> and Joab <WH3097> repaired <WH2421> <WH853> the rest <WH7605> of the city. <WH5892>
So David <WH1732> waxed greater and greater: <WH1980> <WH1980> <WH1431> for the LORD <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635> was with <WH5973> him.

These <WH428> also are the chief <WH7218> of the mighty men <WH1368> whom <WH834> David <WH1732> had, who strengthened themselves <WH2388> with <WH5973> him in his kingdom, <WH4438> and with <WH5973> all <WH3605> Israel, <WH3478> to make him king, <WH4427> according to the word <WH1697> of the LORD <WH3068> concerning <WH5921> Israel. <WH3478>

And this <WH428> is the number <WH4557> of the mighty men <WH1368> whom <WH834> David <WH1732> had; Jashobeam, <WH3434> a Hachmonite, <WH1121> <WH2453> the chief <WH7218> of the captains: <WH7991> he <WH1931> lifted up <WH5782> <WH853> his spear <WH2595> against <WH5921> three <WH7969> hundred <WH3967> slain <WH2491> by him at one <WH259> time. <WH6471>
And after <WH310> him was Eleazar <WH499> the son <WH1121> of Dodo, <WH1734> the Ahohite, <WH266> who <WH1931> was one of the three <WH7969> mighty men. <WH1368>

He <WH1931> was <WH1961> with <WH5973> David <WH1732> at Pas-dammim, <WH6450> and there <WH8033> the Philistines <WH6430> were gathered together <WH622> to battle, <WH4421> where was <WH1961> a parcel <WH2513> of ground <WH7704> full <WH4392> of barley; <WH8184> and the people <WH5971> fled <WH5127> from before <WH4480> <WH6440> the Philistines. <WH6430>

And they set themselves <WH3320> in the midst <WH8432> of that parcel, <WH2513> and delivered <WH5337> it, and slew <WH5221> <WH853> the Philistines; <WH6430> and the LORD <WH3068> saved <WH3467> them by a great <WH1419> deliverance. <WH8668>

Now three <WH7969> of <WH4480> the thirty <WH7970> captains <WH7218> went down <WH3381> to <WH5921> the rock <WH6697> to <WH413> David, <WH1732> into <WH413> the cave <WH4631> of Adullam; <WH5725> and the host <WH4264> of the Philistines <WH6430> encamped <WH2583> in the valley <WH6010> of Rephaim. <WH7497>
And David <WH1732> was then <WH227> in the hold, <WH4686> and the Philistines' <WH6430> garrison <WH5333> was then <WH227> at Bethlehem. <WH1035>

And David <WH1732> longed, <WH183> and said, <WH559> Oh that <WH4310> one would give me drink <WH8248> of the water <WH4325> of the well <WH4480> <WH953> of Bethlehem, <WH1035> that <WH834> is at the gate! <WH8179>

And the three <WH7969> broke through <WH1234> the host <WH4264> of the Philistines, <WH6430> and drew <WH7579> water <WH4325> out of the well <WH4480> <WH953> of Bethlehem, <WH1035> that <WH834> was by the gate, <WH8179> and took <WH5375> it, and brought <WH935> it to <WH413> David: <WH1732> but David <WH1732> would <WH14> not <WH3808> drink <WH8354> of it, but poured it out <WH5258> <WH853> to the LORD, <WH3068>

And said, <WH559> My God <WH4480> <WH430> forbid it <WH2486> me, that I should do <WH4480> <WH6213> this thing: <WH2063> shall I drink <WH8354> the blood <WH1818> of these <WH428> men <WH376> that have put their lives <WH5315> in jeopardy? for <WH3588> with the jeopardy of their lives <WH5315> they brought <WH935> it. Therefore he would <WH14> not <WH3808> drink <WH8354> it. These things <WH428> did <WH6213> these three <WH7969> mightiest. <WH1368>

And Abishai <WH52> the brother <WH251> of Joab, <WH3097> he <WH1931> was <WH1961> chief <WH7218> of the three: <WH7969> for lifting up <WH5782> <WH853> his spear <WH2595> against <WH5921> three <WH7969> hundred, <WH3967> he <WH1931> slew <WH2491> them, and had a name <WH8034> among the three. <WH7969>

Of <WH4480> the three, <WH7969> he was more honorable <WH3513> than the two; <WH8147> for he was <WH1961> their captain: <WH8269> howbeit he attained <WH935> not <WH3808> to <WH5704> the first three. <WH7969>

Benaiah <WH1141> the son <WH1121> of Jehoiada, <WH3111> the son <WH1121> of a valiant <WH2428> man <WH376> of <WH4480> Kabzeel, <WH6909> who had done many <WH7227> acts; <WH6467> he <WH1931> slew <WH5221> <WH853> two <WH8147> lionlike men <WH739> of Moab: <WH4124> also he <WH1931> went down <WH3381> and slew <WH5221> <WH853> a lion <WH738> in <WH8432> a pit <WH953> in a snowy <WH7950> day. <WH3117>

And he <WH1931> slew <WH5221> <WH853> an Egyptian, <WH376> <WH4713> a man <WH376> of great stature, <WH4060> five <WH2568> cubits <WH520> high; and in the Egyptian's <WH4713> hand <WH3027> was a spear <WH2595> like a weaver's <WH707> beam; <WH4500> and he went down <WH3381> to <WH413> him with a staff, <WH7626> and plucked <WH1497> <WH853> the spear <WH2595> out of the Egyptian's hand, <WH4480> <WH3027> <WH4713> and slew <WH2026> him with his own spear. <WH2595>
These <WH428> things did <WH6213> Benaiah <WH1141> the son <WH1121> of Jehoiada, <WH3111> and had the name <WH8034> among the three <WH7969> mighty men. <WH1368>

Behold, <WH2009> he <WH1931> was honorable <WH3513> among <WH4480> the thirty, <WH7970> but attained <WH935> not <WH3808> to <WH413> the first three: <WH7969> and David <WH1732> set <WH7760> him over <WH5921> his guard. <WH4928>
Also the valiant men <WH1368> of the armies <WH2428> were, Asahel <WH6214> the brother <WH251> of Joab, <WH3097> Elhanan <WH445> the son <WH1121> of Dodo <WH1734> of Bethlehem, <WH4480> <WH1035>
Shammoth <WH8054> the Harorite, <WH2033> Helez <WH2503> the Pelonite, <WH6397>
Ira <WH5896> the son <WH1121> of Ikkesh <WH6142> the Tekoite, <WH8621> Abiezer <WH44> the Antothite, <WH6069>
Sibbecai <WH5444> the Hushathite, <WH2843> Ilai <WH5866> the Ahohite, <WH266>
Maharai <WH4121> the Netophathite, <WH5200> Heled <WH2466> the son <WH1121> of Baanah <WH1196> the Netophathite, <WH5200>
Ithai <WH863> the son <WH1121> of Ribai <WH7380> of Gibeah, <WH4480> <WH1390> that pertained to the children <WH1121> of Benjamin, <WH1144> Benaiah <WH1141> the Pirathonite, <WH6553>
Hurai <WH2360> of the brooks <WH4480> <WH5158> of Gaash, <WH1608> Abiel <WH22> the Arbathite, <WH6164>
Azmaveth <WH5820> the Baharumite, <WH978> Eliahba <WH455> the Shaalbonite, <WH8170>
The sons <WH1121> of Hashem <WH2044> the Gizonite, <WH1493> Jonathan <WH3129> the son <WH1121> of Shage <WH7681> the Hararite, <WH2043>
Ahiam <WH279> the son <WH1121> of Sacar <WH7940> the Hararite, <WH2043> Eliphal <WH465> the son <WH1121> of Ur, <WH218>
Hepher <WH2660> the Mecherathite, <WH4382> Ahijah <WH281> the Pelonite, <WH6397>
Hezro <WH2695> the Carmelite, <WH3761> Naarai <WH5293> the son <WH1121> of Ezbai, <WH229>
Joel <WH3100> the brother <WH251> of Nathan, <WH5416> Mibhar <WH4006> the son <WH1121> of Haggeri, <WH1905>
Zelek <WH6768> the Ammonite, <WH5984> Naharai <WH5171> the Berothite, <WH1307> the armorbearer <WH5375> <WH3627> of Joab <WH3097> the son <WH1121> of Zeruiah, <WH6870>
Ira <WH5896> the Ithrite, <WH3505> Gareb <WH1619> the Ithrite, <WH3505>
Uriah <WH223> the Hittite, <WH2850> Zabad <WH2066> the son <WH1121> of Ahlai, <WH304>
Adina <WH5721> the son <WH1121> of Shiza <WH7877> the Reubenite, <WH7206> a captain <WH7218> of the Reubenites, <WH7206> and thirty <WH7970> with <WH5921> him,
Hanan <WH2605> the son <WH1121> of Maachah, <WH4601> and Joshaphat <WH3146> the Mithnite, <WH4981>

Eliel <WH447> the Mahavite, <WH4233> and Jeribai, <WH3403> and Joshaviah, <WH3145> the sons <WH1121> of Elnaam, <WH493> and Ithmah <WH3495> the Moabite, <WH4125>
Eliel, <WH447> and Obed, <WH5744> and Jasiel <WH3300> the Mesobaite. <WH4677>
